com.hcs.prototype.hcs_prototype

Class CaseStudy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hcs.prototype.hcs_prototype.CaseStudy

  • public class CaseStudy
extends java.lang.Object

    Case Study Class

    The CaseStudy class implements case study related functions. Static methods provide access to the case study database and allow the user to write/read from the database. The case study object allows the user to manipulate the case study objects and manipulate their data
    Since:
    0.2 //TODO: version numbers in github

        public CaseStudy(int pk,
         java.lang.String id,
         java.lang.String name,
         java.lang.String description,
         java.lang.String location,
         java.lang.String type)
        create a new CaseStudy object
        Parameters:
        id - the unique id for the case study
        name - the display name of the case study
        type - the type of the case study (local = loaded from inside apk, disk = loaded from teh internal storage of the device)
        location - the location on the disk of the case study
